content.new:
When on the Visual tab in the Link Inspector, pressing Enter creates another visual by selecting the '+Another Visual button'. This should be disabled as it's easy to accidentally create extra visuals without noticing.

content.old: When on the Visual tab in the Link Inspector, pressing Enter creates another visual by selecting the '+Another Visual button'. This should be disabled as it's easy to accidentally create extra visuals without noticing.

issue.title: In Link Inspector, don't let hitting Enter create new visual
